Title: MSRDS / MRDS / MSRS Services (eRobots)
Description:
Developed simulated and real implementation services for working with mobile robotics and Microsoft Robotics Developer Studio are shared here.

For now, works are result of going towards USAR behavior-based controllers for multiple QuadDifferential robots.

Most of the services are coded in C#.
HomeWiki:
GENERAL DESCRIPTION
Source code from different developed simulated and real implementation services for working with mobile robotics are shared here.
For now, works are result of going towards USAR behavior-based controllers for multiple robots allowing heterogeneity and using MSRDS as main framework.
SERVICES AVAILABLE
Service Tree
MAIN INTENDED CONTRIBUTIONS
Create an online repository of services being developed on our way to a Multi-Agent Robotic System for Urban Search and Rescue (USAR) missions using MSRDS.
Services are planned to range from very simple/primitive behaviors to more complex localization, machine vision, and artificial intelligence applications.
